item.title: The Current Status of Selenium 1 and Selenium 2
item.description: In the beginning there was Se1, and it was good. But it could have been better — in ways that WebDriver was starting to be good at. Thus the brilliant idea was hatched to merge the two projects. And then the confusion began. Let’s see if I can start to address some of it via a ficticious conversation that consolidates the Se-user list and #selenium irc channel. There are a couple annoying bugs in Se-RC 1.
